en.title: Easiest Crypto Miner Arrives in the Market

post.content:
[M2 Pro Miner](https://www.matchx.io/m2pro), a cryptocurrency miner that has been flying off the shelves, has arrived in the market. The M2 Pro is a cryptocurrency miner that has been designed with ease of use and high profitability in mind. The miner is MXC’s response to the ever-rising cost of cryptocurrency mining and the ever-decreasing profit margin for many miners since Bitcoin halving. 

[Huobi Mall](https://www.hpt.com/announcement/x9) has started receiving their share of the M2 Pro cryptocurrency miner to start shipping out to eager miners who are ready to mine MXC and other tokens using the highly-praised miner. Meanwhile, customers around the world who have pre-ordered their M2 Pro cryptocurrency miner have begun receiving theirs. 

Compared to other cryptocurrency miners, MXC M2 Pro Miner boasts feasibility and profitability. This means that a miner requires less than 5 minutes from unboxing to a completed set up, allowing the MXC miner network to expand over vast distances in a record time. 

Thanks to this, M2 Pro Miners have been appearing all around the world, including key markets such as China, Korea, and the United States, and other strategic areas in Europe, Asia, Australia, and South America. 

Due to the vast number of pre-orders received, users have been eagerly waiting to get their hands on their M2 Pro cryptocurrency miner. The wait is bound to end as MXC prepares to significantly increase its miner network rapidly and globally.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The MXC Foundation is a purpose-built Blockchain Foundation, based in Berlin. Our mission is to inspire fast, efficient, decentralized data exchanges using LPWAN (Low Power Wide Area Network) and Blockchain technology. Want to learn more about LPWAN? 
Watch the [“What is LPWAN?”](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JOXZC6Qgnr0&t) Introduction [Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JOXZC6Qgnr0&t)
Or visit our LPWAN partner site: [WhatIsLPWAN.com](https://www.whatislpwan.com/) for more information
post.metaDescription: M2 Pro Cryptocurrency miner has arrived in the market. Produced in collaboration between MXC and MatchX, M2 Pro is now supported by Huobi.
